title: Animations and CSS Tricks
description: A small site used to experiment and showcase some simple animations and as well as css tricks

title: Warcraft Auctions
description: A site that helps players in World of Warcraft make decisions on which items to buy on the auction house through graphs which display price and quantity information.

title: Webdev Slayer
description: A turn based game fighting game with a web developer theme.  You start as a junior dev and go through the caves of code to fight your way through until you face the final super developer boss.

title: Star Wars Database
description: A Star Wars database used to teach myself react hooks and Firebase.  My goal with this project was to teach myself hooks by creating a full CRUD application as well as incorporating a database.
tags: ReactJS, JavaScript, Firebase, SWAPI API, Sketch

title: Dog Hot Dog
description: A fun mini game where you are shown GIFs and must choose if it is a Dog or Hot Dog.  The game is timed and once you've completed the game you can post your score to the leaderboard.
tags: ReactJS, JavaScript, Firebase, Giphy API, Sketch, Dogs, Hot Dogs

title: Animal Facts (WIP)
description: Currently a WIP.  An interactive animal fact generator for different animals around the world.  Watch in slideshow mode or pick from a number of different animals.
